message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this incredible product that's worth a lot to me. I'm open to offers, but I'm looking to get at least $10000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to pay $8000 for it.
Bob, I understand your offer, but I'm not ready to go that low just yet. I'm willing to come down to $9000.  This is still a great deal for a product of this caliber.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm willing to pay $8500 for the product.
